targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_queries" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_connections" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_bytes_received" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_bytes_sent" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1h) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_bytes_received" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1h) FROM "1h"."mysql_global_status_bytes_sent" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)

SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_filesystem_size" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "mountpoint" !~ /^\/var\/named/ AND "fstype" !~ /rootfs|selinuxfs|autofs|rpc_pipefs|tmpfs/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "mountpoint", "device", "fstype" fill(null)

SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_filesystem_avail" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "mountpoint" !~ /^\/var\/named/ AND "fstype" !~ /rootfs|selinuxfs|autofs|rpc_pipefs|tmpfs/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "mountpoint", "device", "fstype" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_disk_reads_completed" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_disk_writes_completed" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_disk_bytes_read" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_disk_bytes_written" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("max"), 1s)  * 100 FROM "1h"."node_cpu" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "mode" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_load1" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_memory_MemTotal" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_memory_MemFree" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_memory_Cached" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_memory_Buffers" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "1h"."node_memory_MemAvailable" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_network_receive_bytes" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "device" <> 'lo' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("max"), 1s) FROM "1h"."node_network_transmit_bytes" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "device" <> 'lo' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias", "device" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("max"), 1h) FROM "1h"."node_network_receive_bytes" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "device" <> 'lo' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("max"), 1h) FROM "1h"."node_network_transmit_bytes" WHERE "alias" = '$host' AND "device" <> 'lo' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "alias" fill(null)
